physical_appearance:\The image shows a photocollage. It is rectangular in shape. There are red flowers depicted in the photocollage
 at its four sides. At the lower hand side
 two elderly men are depicted. They are smiling and one of them is pointing. At the loer right hand side
 there is a green sign with the words \\Cadangan Untuk Negara Ku\\. The buildings depicted in the photocollage are arranged in five sections

metadata.title_text: Bandar Sri Tiang Kolom (from the Candangan-Candangan Untuk Negaraku series)
metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a photocollage. It is rectangular in shape. There are red flowers depicted in the photocollage, at its four sides. At the lower hand side, two elderly men are depicted. They are smiling and one of them is pointing. At the loer right hand side, there is a green sign with the words ""Cadangan Untuk Negara Ku"". The buildings depicted in the photocollage are arranged in five sections
metadata.subject_terms_1: and tiny bridges connect these sections. Villages buildings (structures) terrace houses bungalows villages cultural landscapes monuments towns depictions (visual works)
